content: I just noticed that if you type out the URL for one of the STU3 documentation pages but leave out ".html", you're redirected the the R4 version of that page. That if, if you e.g. type in http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/observation, you're taken to http://hl7.org/fhir/observation.html (rather than http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/observation.html, which is what I would have expected). Is that something that could perhaps be changed?
That's actually true for DSTU2 and other releases as well. @Grahame Grieve ?
at least, fixing for the milestone releases. I can't be bothered fixing for all the various ballot versions (300k+ files)
